## Matrix.isIdentityAs3x2() method

Check if the current matrix is identity as a texture matrix (3x2 store in 4x4)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isIdentityAs3x2(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true is the matrix is the identity matrix
